segments.text: Thank god you showed up when you did ! He ’ s insane ! Do you think we should call the police ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry about it , I ’ ll call my friend and have him take care of it . I can ’ t believe he was stalking you all these years . What a nut job !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know ! Well ... he said I ’ m not pregnant . I ’ m sorry if I got you all worked up over nothing . I want you to know that I didn ’ t do it on purpose ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t apologize ! From the moment I met you , not a day has gone by when I haven ’ t thought of you.And now that I ’ m with you again , I ’ m ... I ’ m just scared , Veronica . The closer I get to you , the worse it gets . The thought of not being with you , I mean , I just can ’ t handle it ! We were made for each other , Veronica . You are my everything , my soul mate . What can I do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just hold me ... I ’ ll always be here for you , no matter what . And together , we can tackle whatever life throws at us . I believe in us , steven .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m so happy to hear that ! I knew we belong together . I love you so much .
segments.speaker: S2
